Entire Month June

National Rose Month

June is National Rose Month. With over 150 different species throughout North America, roses are in peak bloom in June. They are a hardy plant that can be added to any landscape. #NationalRoseMonth

üíê
June 1-7

National Garden Week

National Garden Week takes place the first full week in June every year. Gardens provide fresh fruits and vegetables, beautify neighborhoods and communities and provide social and physical activities throughout the year. #NationalGardenWeek

Seasonal

Tricky Trees

After a season of winter weather and storms, folks begin to realize problem areas in their own backyard. Trees leaning dangerously close to the house, trees that have fallen over the last few months, or tree that need to be trimmed to keep residents safe are all top mind for new and tenured home owners.

Common Terms & Phrases

Consider educating your followers about these, as needed

Common Early Spring Weeds

Dandelions, White or Dutch Clover, Hairy Bittercress

Hardscape Elements

Walkways, Driveways, Patios, Swimming pools, Sprinkler systems, Fountains, Stone benches, Gates, Flagstone and other rocks, Arbors

Softscape Elements

Grass, Trees, Shrubs, Flowers, Soil, Vegetable gardens
